short_summary: Bulk Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) to National Parks in Western Canada
description: Regional Individual Standing Offer(s) for the provision of Bulk Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) to several National Parks in Western Canada for helicopters used in fire management operations.',
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
______________________
### Title
**Title:** 5P420-230260_B Bulk Aviation Fuel
**Title (French):** 5P420-230260_B Carburant d'Aviation en Vrac

### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide Bulk Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) to several National Parks in Western Canada.

### Key Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4495730676
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-02
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-13T14:00:00 (2 p.m. EST)
* **Standing Offer Period:** June 1, 2024 to April 30, 2026, with the possibility of a one-year extension option from May 1, 2026 to April 30, 2027.

### Tender Scope
The successful contractor will be responsible for supplying mobile fuel tankers containing Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) fuel on an as-required basis during the Standing Offer Period. The fuel must conform to Standard CAN/CGSB 3.23-2023 (latest issue).

### Additional Requirements
In addition to fuel supply, a refueling operator and a driver may be required to move the mobile tanker to various areas within the parks, particularly for larger fires.

### Compliance Criteria
Bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the specified tender closing date. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information
For further information, contact:
Jackson Hiltz (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [No phone number available]
Email: jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[No fax number available]

### Post-Tender Information
A link to the tender notice is available on Ariba Discovery:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19580221?extsite=MTk1ODAyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This announcement is also available in French. ______________________
